Package com.teambaccrat.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teambaccrat.model.Game
  • public class Game
extends Object
    Calculates outcome of a game of Baccarat when given a bet and wager.

    • Method Detail

      • setBet

        public void setBet​(String userBet)
            throws IllegalBetException
        Checks if the bet is valid and sets the userBet to the matching Bet value
        Parameters:
        userBet - the bet given by user
        Throws:
        IllegalBetException - Thrown if userBet does not equal 1, 2, or 3.

      • getBet

        public Bet getBet()

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount​(int amount)
               throws IllegalWagerAmountException,
                      NoBalanceException
        Checks if the amount is a valid amount and sets the amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - the wager amount given by user
        Throws:
        IllegalWagerAmountException - Thrown if the bet amount is less than 20 or greater than 100.
        NoBalanceException - Thrown if the bet amount is greater than current balance.

        public Game.Result whoWon​(Hand player,
                          Hand banker)
        Determines the Game.Result of the game by comparing points of both hands

        banker - the banker hand
        Returns:

      • start

        public void start​(BiConsumer<Hand,​Boolean> consumer)
        Deals cards from Shoe to each hand, determines whether either hand gets third card, and updates information based on final results.
        Parameters:
        consumer - used as a callback to determine banker vs player hand
